caption.p: A map of México showing the boundaries of the Mexican states. The white dotted circles represent the occurrence records of Aedes albopictus available for the model calibration. The red dotted circles represent the occurrence records of natural Wolbachia infections in Ae. albopictus populations. The green background depicts the accessible areas where the Ae. albopictus model was calibrated. The square in the bottom left corner of the map presents a close-up of the central states of México.
